archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1316
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to learn more about subscription billing and how it differs from other traditional billing services that I'm used to, so that I can decide if it is right for me.

properties.value: Generic information not related to any particular service. Rather a part of VF CMS, may be linked to particular offering page

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
